lines.text:
[Samantha has a nosebleed]
Do you have some ice?
Oh my God. Come on in. Sit down. Paul, get some ice.
[to Samantha]
Hold your head back, back.
[to Paul]
Hurry.
[to Samantha]
What happened?
Nothing. I just get them sometimes.
Here you go.
Listen, sweetheart, this may be butting in where I don't belong, but don't you think someone should say something?
For what, a nosebleed? Come on, I've had them since I was a kid. Ice will take care of it. I just forgot to fill the tray.
Oh, Sam, I don't like this.
I hate them.
C'mon you know what I mean. It's criminal. He could go to jail.
He's my father. Sometimes I want to roll a truck over his face but he's still my father.
Hey, she's dead? Hey, what the hell are you doing, you didn't say anything about a dead body, we were supposed to save her life!
Old man Pringle and Mrs. Parker, both dead. His face was burned off.
Elvira Parker?
Yeah, I heard somebody say she called the police. Said she saw Sam in her bedroom window. From what I hear, Elvira's head's all over the walls in there.

[Tom falls off his bike]
Geez. Arey ou all right?
What the hell is that?
Oh, his name is BB. Are you all right?
BB.
Yeah, sure. Ha. Is he for real? Where did you get him?
I made him. What's your name?
Tom.
BB, this is Tom.
[BB puts his mechanical arm out to shake hands]
Come on, it's okay.
[Tom and BB shake hands]
I can't believe this.
[BB helps Tom up off the ground]
Hi.
Hi.
I thought I'd come by. If you're busy or eating I can come back.
Uh, we're done. Come on in.
I wanted to bake you something, but I couldn't. I just brought these.
[Samantha gives Paul a box of "Almost Home" cookies]
Oh, I love these. I love them. Thank you, come on in. Come on in.

[Elvira rolls the basketball inside her house]
Hey, you can't do that.
Oh yes, I can. My property. My house. My ball.
What a witch!
[Sam emerges into an evil version of BB and chokes Paul to his death, talking in a evil, whispering voice]
Paul. Come with me, Paul.

[screaming]
NOOOOOOOO!
[Sam snaps Paul's neck]
BB.
